attributes.action: Petition the Polish Government to rename Warsaw Modlin Airport "Tony Blair International"
attributes.additional_details:
Tony Blair has recently been recognised by Polish business leaders as instrumental in giving polish workers access to low paid UK jobs and social services not available to them in Poland.

Given that Warsaw Modlin airport is now the main entry into the UK for polish migrant workers, it seems appropriate that the Government should pay tribute to the former Prime Minister by renaming the airport "Tony Blair International" in recognition of the vast benefits he has brought to Poland.
